text: eman walo! Shetan kay qadam-ba-qadam na chalo. Jo shaks shetani qadmon ki pairwee keray to woh to bey hayaee aur buray kaamon ka hi hukum keray ga. Aur agar Allah Taalaa ka fazal-o-karam tum per na hota to tum mein say koi bhi kabhi bhi pak saaf na hota. Lekin Allah Taalaa jissay pak kerna chahaye ker deta hai aur Allah sab sunnay wala sab jannay wala hai
